FAMAZOA - F-droid AndroidtimeMachine AndroZoo Open-source Applications

The largest publicy available dataset of Open-source applications written in Kotlin.
Published in the Empirical Software Engineering journal.

Get Started


android

269 Real applications

The version 2 of out dataset has 269 real apps published on Google Play Store or on F-Droid Store.

code

Open-Source

As all applications that compose our dataset are open-source you can access directly their code to do whaterver you want, for instance, static analysis.

settings

Easy to use

Get the list of repository, clone them and that's done. Enjoy!

school Bruno Góis Mateus

is a Ph.D. candidate at Université Polytechnique Hauts-de-France, Valenciennes, France and assistant professor of Software Engineering at the Federal University of Ceara - Campus Quixadá, Quixadá – CE, Brazil. His work focuses specifically on empirical software engineering and studying quality of mobile applications.
